card.name: Academic's Claymore
card.text: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it and draw a card. Equip {1}

card.name: Turela, Defiant Angel
card.text: Flash Flying When Turela, Defiant Angel enters, exile all other creatures you control. Return them to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Captain Mattias Ochre
card.text: Creatures you control have haste and attack each combat if able. Attacking Soldiers you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Edge of the Water
card.text: If you would draw one or more cards, instead you may draw that many cards plus one, then discard a card. As long as ten or more cards are in your graveyard, noncreature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Daisy, the Heart of Chasmek
card.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control four or more lands. {G}, Sacrifice Daisy, the Heart of Chasmek: Creatures you control with base power 1 or less gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Crystal Garden
card.text: Crystal Garden enters tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color. You can't spend this mana to cast a creature spell.

card.name: Glymna Blackrune
card.text: When Glymna Blackrune enters, exile target player's graveyard. During each of your turns, you may cast a creature card exiled with Glymna Blackrune.

card.name: Academy Renegade
card.text: When Academy Renegade enters, it deals damage to target creature you don't control equal to the number of Wizards you control. Whenever Academy Renegade attacks, it deals damage to defending player equal to the number of Wizards you control.

card.name: Autumn's Farewell
card.text: Choose target creature or planeswalker. Its controller may exile it. If that player doesn't, they sacrifice all other creatures and planeswalkers they control.

card.name: Tidal Spite
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap any number of untapped storied permanents you control. Return X target creatures to their owner's hand, where X is one plus the number of permanents tapped this way.

card.name: Welcome Return
card.text: Whenever a creature you control enters from a graveyard, target opponent loses life equal to its power.

card.name: Jak, Daring Vanguard
card.text: Whenever Jak, Daring Vanguard or another legendary creature you control enters, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Caller of Hunger
card.text: {1}{G}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, where X is 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Charting the Cosmos
card.text: Reveal the top seven cards of your library. Starting with you, each player chooses a nonland card from among them that hasn't been chosen this way. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Seventh Circle Cultist
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {B}. If you do, return a Wizard card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Aquilifer Axelius
card.text: Other creatures you control can't attack or block alone.

card.name: Antimagic Formula
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each storied permanent you control. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.) Counter target spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Jara Champion
card.text: Menace Jara Champion can only attack or block alone. Whenever one or more players lose life for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Jara Champion.

card.name: Lost to the Ages
card.text: Put target artifact or enchantment with mana value less than or equal to the number of basic lands you control on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Titan's Will
card.text: Nonstoried creatures lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: Vengeful Messenger
card.text: Flash Flying Sacrifice Vengeful Messenger: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Villainy
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures die for the first time each turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. Whenever you cast a black noncreature spell, Villainy deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Dragoncalling
card.text: This spell can't be countered. For each spell you've cast this turn, search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.

card.name: Leyline Alignment Field
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: For each color among cards in your graveyard, add one mana of that color.

card.name: Apotheosis
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more storied permanents, you win the game. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: Bretala of Redsky
card.text: Flying, trample Whenever Bretala of Redsky attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn unless defending player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Rujan, the Great Pumpkin
card.text: Trample Players can't activate abilities of nonbasic, noncreature permanents.

card.name: Daring Skythief
card.text: Whenever Daring Skythief crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Tianyuren Skycharter
card.text: Flying Tianyuren Skycharter has hexproof as long as you control a storied permanent. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: Takeda Taro
card.text: First strike Whenever Takeda Taro deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals 1 damage to each creature and planeswalker that player controls.

card.name: Great and Small
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap three untapped creatures you control with power 1 or less. Search your library for a creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Overloaded Aethergate
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {7}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell with {X} in its mana cost. You may choose new targets for the copy. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

card.name: Curse-Blood Morrigan
card.text: Menace, deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Mirrorgate
card.text: Mirrorgate enters tapped. When Mirrorgate enters, you choose a nonbasic land card name other than Mirrorgate, then each player chooses a color. Lands with the chosen name are lands with "{T}: Add one mana of any of the chosen colors," and lose all other abilities, card types, and land types. {T}: Add one mana of any of the chosen colors.

card.name: Titan's Palace
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with mana value 5 or greater.

card.name: Spring Renewal
card.text: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for that many basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Brave the Issbarrens
card.text: As Brave the Issbarrens enters, choose a color. White creatures you control have protection from the chosen color. (This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with that color.)

card.name: Voidlife Orbs
card.text: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Voidlife Orbs: Destroy all nonland permanents. You can't spend more than one color of mana to activate this ability.

card.name: Finale of Cinders
card.text: Finale of Cinders deals 2 damage to any target. For each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard, you may pay {R}. Whenever you do, Finale of Cinders deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Chratteri Restoration
card.text: Each player gains 4 life and returns all land cards from their graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Magdel, Caller of Souls
card.text: Protection from sorceries Whenever Magdel, Caller of Souls attacks, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking for each storied permanent you control. Exile the tokens at end of combat. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: The Aether Lens
card.text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed. Whenever you cast a spell with the same name as a card in an opponent's hand, draw two cards.

card.name: Backwood Rangers
card.text: Basic Forests you control have "{G}, {T}: Untap target attacking creature and remove it from combat."

card.name: Tempus Fugit
card.text: At the beginning of the next upkeep, untap all noncreature permanents you control and draw a card. Exile Tempus Fugit.

card.name: Epic Score
card.text: Create two tokens that are copies of target noncreature artifact or noncreature artifact card in a graveyard.

card.name: Remnant of the Wild
card.text: Trample When Remnant of the Wild enters, if you cast it, untap all lands you control.

card.name: Golden Company Tactics
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Repeat this process if you control a Soldier. Repeat this process again if you control a Knight.

card.name: Start Anew
card.text: Draw two cards. If you have no cards in hand and there are no cards in your graveyard, draw seven cards instead.

card.name: Sinister Heir
card.text: Whenever a storied permanent you control enters, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.) {2}{B}{B}, Sacrifice Sinister Heir: Return target storied card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Glorysinger
card.text: Attacking creatures you control have first strike. Whenever three or more creatures you control die, Glorysinger deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Arpechian Champion
card.text: Trample Arpechian Champion can only attack or block alone. Whenever a land you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Arpechian Champion.

card.name: Right to Rule
card.text: Whenever you cast a storied spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card. (Enchantments and legendary spells are storied.) Sacrifice Right to Rule: Storied permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Terror of Palta Gorge
card.text: Protection from nonblue Whenever Terror of Palta Gorge attacks, exile another target nonblue creature until Terror of Palta Gorge leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Memento Mori
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target player's graveyard. • Target player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Meteor Fall
card.text: Choose one — • Meteor Fall deals 4 damage to each creature and each planeswalker. • Meteor Fall deals 8 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Arbiter of the Scales
card.text: Flash Flying As long as an opponent controls more creatures than you, Arbiter of the Scales gets +2/+2 and has first strike and lifelink.

card.name: Oscanthor, Trader's Ruin
card.text: Flash Oscanthor, Trader's Ruin can't be blocked. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Overwhelming Armies
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is two plus the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Mossy Companion
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample

card.name: Storytime
card.text: If you would lose the game, instead sacrifice a storied permanent. If you do and your life total is less than 1, it becomes 1.

card.name: Meadow's Melody
card.text: Gain control of target creature with power X or less.

card.name: Ultim Nox
card.text: Cast this spell only if you control a creature. Exile all creatures.

card.name: Regal Ignition
card.text: Each player sacrifices three lands. Regal Ignition deals 3 damage to each nonlegendary creature.

card.name: Just Business
card.text: Target player sacrifices a legendary creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Lady Ashtongue
card.text: Flying Other Dragons you control have haste. {R}: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Ol' Sycamore
card.text: When Ol' Sycamore enters, choose up to two — • Ol' Sycamore fights another target legendary creature. • Destroy target noncreature storied permanent. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: Herald of Heroes
card.text: Whenever Herald of Heroes deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card with power 2 or less from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Against the Waves
card.text: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards named Against the Waves in your graveyard. Draw a card, then conjure three cards named Against the Waves and shuffle them into your main library.

card.name: Warden of the Dead
card.text: When Warden of the Dead enters, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. When Warden of the Dead dies, conjure three cards named Warden of the Dead and shuffle them into your main library. For the rest of the game, you may cast spells named Warden of the Dead without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Overclock
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. Overclock deals X damage to you, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn.

card.name: Chratteri Valiant
card.text: Other Warriors you control have trample. {G}: Chratteri Valiant gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Chronofracture
card.text: Search target opponent's library for six cards and exile them, then that player shuffles. Skip your next turn.

card.name: Warrior's Request
card.text: You may put a Dragon creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Greenwood Outrider
card.text: Haste When Greenwood Outrider enters, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of storied permanents you control. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: Outsmart
card.text: Counter target spell if you have more cards in hand than its controller.

card.name: Embrace Madness
card.text: Whenever you discard a card this turn, add {B}. Then you may cast that card. (You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Unceasing Flames
card.text: Unceasing Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Unceasing Flames in your graveyard. Conjure three cards named Unceasing Flames and shuffle them into your main library.

card.name: Spirit
card.text: Flying

card.name: Unceasings Flames Reminder 101
card.text: Unceasing Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Unceasing Flames in your graveyard. Conjure three cards named Unceasing Flames and shuffle them into your main library.

card.name: Against the Waves Reminder 101
card.text: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards named Against the Waves in your graveyard. Draw a card, then conjure three cards named Against the Waves and shuffle them into your main library.

card.name: Warden of the Dead Reminder 101
card.text: When Warden of the Dead enters, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. When Warden of the Dead dies, conjure three cards named Warden of the Dead and shuffle them into your main library. For the rest of the game, you may cast cards named Warden of the Dead without paying their mana cost.

card.name: Warden of the Dead Emblem 101
card.text: You may cast spells named Warden of the Dead without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Afterlife Heist
card.text: Return up to one target creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand. Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Apex's Oath
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more creatures than you, you may reveal the top seven cards of your library. Target opponent chooses a creature card revealed this way. Put that card onto the battlefield, and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Berbarus Unsealed
card.text: Flying Sacrifice six Swamps: Return Berbarus Unsealed from your graveyard to the battlefield with an indestructible counter on it. You draw six cards and you lose 6 life.

card.name: Calamitous Crash
card.text: Destroy all artifacts with mana value X or less. Whenever an artifact is destroyed this way, Calamitous Crash deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Elder's Wisdom
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a storied card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (Enchantment and legendary cards are storied.)

card.name: Final Reckoning
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each storied permanent you control. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.) Destroy all nonland, nonstoried permanents.

card.name: Fish Out of Water
card.text: When Fish Out of Water enters, exile the top four cards of each library. During each of your turns, you may cast a card exiled with Fish Out of Water without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Golden Company Valiant
card.text: Golden Company Valiant can block any number of creatures. At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, Golden Company Valiant gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature that player controls.

card.name: Gorbes Index
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value equal to 1 plus the exiled card's mana value, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Happy Together
card.text: Planeswalker spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each storied permanent you control. (Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)

card.name: Hunter's Hideout
card.text: {1}{G}{G}, Discard a card: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. At the beginning of your end step, if twelve or more cards are in your graveyard, create two 3/3 green Beast creature tokens.

card.name: In Memoriam
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if there's a storied card in your graveyard. (Enchantments and legendary cards are storied.) Search your library for a storied card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Meadow Songstress
card.text: When Meadow Songstress enters, conjure three cards named Meadow Songstress and shuffle them into your main library. Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, if it shares a name with one or more other creatures you control, draw a card.

card.name: Puppeteering
card.text: This spell costs {3} less to cast if a creature died this turn. Put target creature card with mana value X from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Rend the Mind
card.text: Choose four nonland card names. Target opponent reveals their hand and discards all cards with the chosen names.

card.name: The Knowledge Hub
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top two cards of your library. An opponent chooses one. Put the chosen card into your hand and exile the other. {4}, {T}: Put a card exiled with The Knowledge Hub into its owner's hand.

card.name: The Lord of All Beyond
card.text: Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, its controller may discard a card that shares a color with that spell. Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter that spell unless they pay 5 life.

card.name: The Start of Something
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: Wandering Souls
card.text: Create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is two plus the number of cards named Wandering Souls in your graveyard. Conjure three cards named Wandering Souls and shuffle them into your main library.

card.name: Words of Eternity
card.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, you may cast Words of Eternity from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If you do, exile it instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves.

card.name: Unbound Academic
card.text: Whenever a Wizard you control deals damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Legacy's Malediction
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, if it's an instant or has flash, you may counter target spell.

card.name: Wandering Souls Reminder 101
card.text: Create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is two plus the number of cards named Wandering Souls in your graveyard. Conjure three cards named Wandering Souls and shuffle them into your main library.

card.name: Meadow Songstress Reminder 101
card.text: When Meadow Songstress enters, conjure three cards named Meadow Songstress and shuffle them into your main library. Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, if it shares a name with one or more other creatures you control, draw a card.
